primarySegments.name: Busy Professionals
primarySegments.description: Dog owners who have demanding jobs and need reliable dog walking services to manage their pets' needs.

problemsNeeds: Lack of time to walk their dogs due to work commitments
Need for trustworthy and reliable dog walkers
Desire for easy scheduling and payment options
behaviors: Frequently use mobile apps for services

primarySegments.name: Elderly Dog Owners
primarySegments.description: Older adults who own dogs and may have physical limitations that make dog walking challenging.

psychographics: May have health or mobility concerns
problemsNeeds: Need for reliable and caring dog walkers
Desire for personalized service and communication
behaviors: Prefer phone or simple app interfaces
Likely to seek consistent and familiar walkers

primarySegments.name: Young Urbanites
primarySegments.description: Young adults living in urban areas who own dogs and seek convenient solutions for pet care.

demographics: College students or early career professionals
psychographics: Interested in social and environmental issues
problemsNeeds: Limited time due to social and work commitments
Need for affordable dog walking services
Desire for eco-friendly and ethical service options
behaviors: Use social media and apps frequently
Likely to share experiences and reviews online
